PreferenceScreen.android:title: WHAT IS JBSOURCERY
PreferenceScreen.android:summary: Sourcery is the rom for customazation fanatic!
Development Lead and Manager of Team Sourcery , Rom Development, Idea man!
CO-Rom Development, Tools app Guru!, GitHub Magician
Official Sourcery Boot animations Designer!, JBSourcery Wallpaper Designer, Public Relations, Support technician, Webpage and Forum Development.
IRC maintainer, Support Technician, Kernel Tester and maintainer.
JBSourcery Themer!
Theme development, graphics assistant,
Theme consultant , Theme development, Rom Tester, Battery mod Maker!
